title: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description: When a large content is placed in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format. The actual result is that the tips are displayed in one line.
OB: When a large content is placed in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line
EB: The tips for a large content in a text item should be displayed in the expected format
